attributes.action: provide private health care for troops, funded by the government.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
There are too many troops injured both physically and mentally whilst serving their country.
They are given the basic healthcare we all get, and while the NHS does its best, it is not acceptable that these servicemen and women are not getting the proper care associated with combat injuries.
They should be entitled to private health care funded by the government, which would enable them to get the correct treatment needed, in the quickest time and in a clean environment.
This healthcare should also extend to any treatment needed once they are fit enough to leave hospital, i.e. physio or any other outpatient care needed.
They should also be given access to properly trained counsellors, able to deal with the mental, or emotional problems that may arise during or after tours of duty.
These people put their lives on the line to keep us safe, the very least they deserve is to know if the worst happens, they can come home to the highest level of care they can have.
